title: @ Jikker / Sona / Fizz / Eva
body:
While you guys are discussing with riot/mods about how to make GD great again 

Can you discuss forum alts / smurfs and how they do not belong here? 

It's my belief that circumventing forum bans shouldn't be allowed and it'd be better if people who need a "time out" actually get them instead of instantly hopping onto another forum account to continue their tirade. 

thank you for your time and effort :)

https://s12.postimg.org/fgaw7alil/324px_Tracer_portrait.png
